summary: Verified complete migration of window.confirm() to useConfirmDialog hook across all 8 files identified in iteration_2. All delete confirmation dialogs now display custom ConfirmDialog component with proper data-testid attributes.
critical_code_review_comments: All 8 files now correctly import useConfirmDialog from './ui/ConfirmDialog'
All files use async/await pattern: const confirmed = await confirm({...}); if (!confirmed) return;
ConfirmDialog displays with proper title, message, variant='danger', and confirmText='Supprimer'
data-testid attributes working: confirm-dialog, confirm-dialog-cancel, confirm-dialog-confirm
context_for_next_testing_agent: ConfirmDialog migration complete. All 8 files that were using window.confirm() are now using useConfirmDialog hook. Tested in Personnel (delete pompier) and Formations (delete formation) - both show custom dialog.

tested_features.personnel_delete: PASS - Custom dialog appears with title 'Supprimer le pompier' and Annuler/Supprimer buttons
tested_features.formations_delete: PASS - Custom dialog appears with title 'Supprimer la formation' and Annuler/Supprimer buttons
tested_features.dialog_data_testid: PASS - Elements have data-testid: confirm-dialog, confirm-dialog-cancel, confirm-dialog-confirm
tested_features.cancel_button: PASS - Clicking Annuler closes dialog without deleting
tested_features.no_native_confirm: PASS - No browser native confirm() dialogs observed
